pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Colour Specialist 1-0 Opulent Black
pageProduct.description:
Information

Schwarzkopf Colour Specialist is a permanent hair colour with up to 100% grey coverage.

The Colour Care System helps the pigments penetrate deep into the hair locking in the colour.

Contains OMEGAPLEX and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid that cares for and protects the hair against breakage. Both during and after colouring.

1. PREPARATION

Before colouring your hair, remove the gloves supplied from the back of the instructions

leaflet and put them on. Cover your clothes with an old towel. Have a watch nearby so you can check the processing time.

Please apply Colour Specialist on dry, unwashed hair.

2. MIXING

Unscrew the cap of the application bottle. Pierce the colour créme tube, with the reverse side of the cap.

Carefully squeeze the entire contents into the application bottle. Place the cap back on the application bottle and close it securely. Shake the bottle vigorously until all ingredients are mixed into a smooth cream.

Twist off the tip of the cap and immediately start with the application process.

ATTENTION: The colour of the mixture of some shades changes during the application process. This has no impact on the final colour result.

3.A FULL HEAD APPLICATION

This method is recommended if:

® you are colouring your hair permanently for the first time.

® your previous hair colour has completely grown out or has been washed away.

Apply the entire mixture, strand after strand, onto all of your hair.

3.B REGROWTH APPLICATION

This method is recommended if:

® your hair has been coloured and the regrowth is visible.

®the ends of your hair are darker or in poor condition. At first, apply 2/3 of the mixture throughout the whole regrowth area.

To do this, part a section of your hair using the tip of the application bottle. Apply the mixture along the parting and distribute it evenly into the roots with your fingertips (leave supplied gloves on). Repeat this procedure for the whole regrowth area.

Leave on to develop for 20 minutes.

4. DISTRIBUTE

Distribute the mixture evenly with your fingertips. Leave on your hair to develop for 30 minutes for a FULL HEAD APPLICATION and 10 minutes for REGROWTH APPLICATION. *

*For shade 9-1 and 10-1 check out leaftlet for recommended application time.

5. RINSE & AFTER TREATMENT

At the end of processing time, apply warm water to the hair and work into lather. Rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.

Afterwards, apply the after colouring repair mask onto towel-dried hair and leave it in for 2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. Depending on the length of your hair, the mask can be used for 1-2 applications.

After 3 weeks, apply the after 3 weeks repair mask onto towel-dried hair and leave it in for 2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.
